item.title: About Me
item.description: About me: a senior high student. programming lover, now learning C. trying to apply the KISS principle to daily life. working on a new human-friendly and logical language. This site offers: tips in programming (for beginners). journals without sensitive information. deep thinkings on world, life and the society. etc.
